mapper.sql: id, odd_num, creation_date, customer, saler, contacts, price, discount_tate, offer, remake, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT offer.id,offer.odd_num,offer.creation_date,cus.customer_name,us.username,cont.contact_name,offer.price,offer.discount_tate,offer.offer,offer.customer_id FROM t_offer offer ,t_customer cus,t_user us,t_contact cont WHERE offer.customer_id = cus.id AND offer.saler_id = us.id AND cont.customer_id = cus.id

SELECT offer.id, offer.customer_id, cus.customer_name, offer.saler_id, us.username, offer.contacts_id, cont.contact_name
FROM t_offer offer, t_customer cus, t_user us, t_contact cont WHERE offer.customer_id = cus.id AND offer.saler_id = us.id AND offer.customer_id = cont.id AND offer.id = #{id}
